camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-sink.stream.name: camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-sink.stream
camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-sink.stream.description: The Kinesis stream that you want to access. The Kinesis stream that you specify must already exist.

camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-sink.accessKey.name: camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-sink.accessKey
camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-sink.accessKey.description: The access key obtained from AWS.

camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-sink.secretKey.name: camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-sink.secretKey
camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-sink.secretKey.description: The secret key obtained from AWS.

camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-sink.useDefaul.name: camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-sink.useDefaultCredentialsProvider
camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-sink.useDefaul.description: If true, the Kinesis client loads credentials through a default credentials provider. If false, it uses the basic authentication method (access key and secret key).

camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-sink.useProfil.name: camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-sink.useProfileCredentialsProvider
camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-sink.useProfil.description: Set whether the Kinesis client should expect to load credentials through a profile credentials provider.

camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-sink.useSessio.name: camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-sink.useSessionCredentials
camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-sink.useSessio.description: Set whether the Kinesis client should expect to use Session Credentials. This is useful in situation in which the user needs to assume a IAM role for doing operations in Kinesis.

camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-sink.profileCr.name: camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-sink.profileCredentialsName
camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-sink.profileCr.description: If using a profile credentials provider this parameter will set the profile name.

camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-sink.sessionTo.name: camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-sink.sessionToken
camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-sink.sessionTo.description: Amazon AWS Session Token used when the user needs to assume a IAM role.

camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-sink.uriEndpoi.name: camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-sink.uriEndpointOverride
camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-sink.uriEndpoi.description: The overriding endpoint URI. To use this option, you must also select the `overrideEndpoint` option.

camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-sink.overrideE.name: camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-sink.overrideEndpoint
camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-sink.overrideE.description: Select this option to override the endpoint URI. To use this option, you must also provide a URI for the `uriEndpointOverride` option.
